section.title: Usage information
section.p: Variant types of note (tip, caution, danger, restriction, etc.) can be indicated through values selected on the type attribute.

section.title: Formatting expectations
section.p: Processors typically render a label for notes. The content of the label depends on the values of the type attribute.
A note typically is formatted in a way that stands out from the surrounding content.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample demonstrates the use of a note with type set to "tip".
example.codeblock: <note type="tip">Thinking of a seashore, green meadow, or cool mountain overlook can help you to relax and be more patient.</note>
